208385.「ヤイルが生まれたのは 国境付近の\n 小さな集落でな。他国からの 侵略を受けて:
Jair was born in a small settlement near the
border. It was destroyed by an invasion from
another country...

208386.「その時 部隊を率いて 駆けつけた私が\n 敵軍に殺されかけていた\n 幼いヤイ:
It was then that I rushed in with my troops
and saved the young Jair from being killed by
enemy forces...

208389.「ここは かつて 私と共に戦った\n 仲間たちの 墓場だ。:
This is the graveyard of those companions who
once fought alongside me.

208390.「院長に どこまで聞いたかはしらんが\n １０００年ほど前 激しい戦乱が あって:
I don't know how much the director told you,
but there was a fierce war about a thousand
years ago.

208391.「その頃 まだ幼かった私は ろくでもない\n 傭兵どもに拾われて 他の子供たちと:
I was only a child when I was picked up by a
bunch of mercenaries and forced to fight
alongside other kids like pawns in the war.

208392.「バニト ディセル ルチオ\n タチアナ スーゴ……。\n 生まれた国は違ったが:
Vanito, Dicel, Lucio, Tatiana, Suego... they
came from different countries, but they were
all dear companions.

208393.「仲間たちとは 戦が終わったら\n みんなで 安心して暮らせる 家を作ろうと\n:
My companions and I used to talk about how we
were going to build a house where we could all
live together in peace when the war was over.

208394.「だが 生き残ったのは 私ひとりだった。\n 彼らは ただ 仲間たちと 静かに\:
But I was the only one who survived. They only
wanted a quiet life with their companions.

208396.「ファラザードの使者とやら。\n 子供たちの花と手紙は まだ持っているか？:
Farazard's messenger. Do you still have the
children's flowers and letter?

208398.「私が 魔界統一を果たし\n この乱世を 終わらせよう。:
I will unite the Demon World and put an end to
this turbulent state of affairs.

208399.「……貴様の主とやらに 伝えておけ。\n 魔仙卿に会って 闇の根源のチカラ\n:
...Tell your lord that I will meet with the
Oracle and make the power of the Source of
Darkness my own.

208400.「私は 準備ができ次第 大審門へ向かう。\n そこで再び会おう ファラザードの者:
I will head for the Demongate as soon as I am
ready. We will meet again there, Farazardans.

208401.「色々と ありがとよ。大きな声じゃァ言えないが\n 俺は 現状で アストルティア:
Thanks for everything. I can't say it out
loud, but I was against invading Astoltia in
our current state.

208402.「今のバルディスタじゃあ アストルティアとの\n 戦は長引き 泥沼化しちまうだろ:
With Valdista as it is now, a war with Astoltia would drag on and become a mess. If that happens, it will be a repeat of the war
from a thousand years ago.

208403.「俺は 魔王ヴァレリアが 大魔王になって\n 魔界統一を果たしたうえで アストル:
I was thinking that Demon King Valeria should
become the Demon Lord, unify the Demon
World, and then invade Astoltia.

208404.「ってなワケで これからは 晴れて敵同士だ。\n もう 協力することも 無いだろ:
So, from now on, we'll be enemies. We won't be
cooperating with each other anymore. Thanks
again for your help.

208405.「……この国でやるべきことは 終わった。\n お前も よくやってくれたな。:
...We've done what we came to do in this
nation. You did well.

208407.「もう バルディスタに用はないな。\n 次は いよいよ 俺の仕える国\n ファラ:
We have no more business in Valdista. Next,
you'll finally get to meet the king of
Farazard, the country that I serve.

208408.「ファラザードは バルディスタ要塞を出て\n ゲルヘナ幻野を 横断して南に行った:
Farazard is a fledgling nation in the
Jyarimbaha Desert, just south of Fortress
Valdista across the Gerhena Field.

208410.「次は ゲルヘナ幻野の東にある\n 魔王アスバルの 治める国\n ゼクレス魔導国:
Next, we'll head east of the Gerhena Field to
Zechres, ruled by the Demon King Asbal.

208414.「ヤイル……なぜ こんなことをした？: Jair... why did you do this?

208415.「ヴァレリア様が\n おかしくなってしまわれる前に\n 私が なんとかせねばと…:
I had to do something before Lady Valeria
went mad...!

208417.「あの日……私は 見てしまったのです。\n 魔王様が ここを訪れているのを……。:
That day... I saw it. I saw the Demon King
visiting this place.

208418.「あの孤児たちと話している時の ヴァレリア様は\n まるで 戦を忘れてしまったか:
When Lady Valeria was talking with those
orphans, she looked as if she had forgotten
about the war!

208419.「冷厳で 強く 美しい……\n 死を運ぶ氷の魔女と 恐れられた魔王様を\n 奴ら:
They tried to corrupt the Demon King, who is
feared as the cold, strong, beautiful...
death-bringing Ice Witch!

208420.「ヴァレリア様は！ 孤高で！ 非情で！\n 氷のように 冷たく……\n 強くあら:
Lady Valeria is solitary! Ruthless! She must
be as cold and strong as ice!

208421.「貴様ッ……！\n そんな くだらん理由で あの子らを……！:
You...! You killed those kids for such a
stupid reason...!

208422.「くだらないものかッ！！\n 奴らが生きていれば 魔王様の弱点として\n いずれ:
Stupid!? If they lived, they would become the
Demon King's weakness, and they would
eventually bring about an unforeseen disaster!

208423.「だからァ そうなる前に バルディスタに仇なす\n ゴミどもを 魔瘴で 掃除して:
So before that could happen, I used demon
miasma to wash away the filth that would
tarnish Valdista! Heehee...hee...Eeyehehahah!!

208424.「そうか。その理由に 嘘は無いのだろう。\n だが…………:
I see. I'm sure you're not lying about your
reasons. However...

208425.「災いを招いたのは 貴様だッ！！:
The only one who brought about disaster was
you!!

208427.「魔瘴の霧が こんなに……。\n 魔王様！ ここは 危険ですので\n さがってく:
So much demon miasma... Demon King! Please
stand back! It's not safe here!

208428.「クソッ！ 飛び込みやがった！\n こんな 濃密な魔瘴の中で\n まだ 生きてる:
Dammit! She jumped right in! Does she think
she can survive in demon miasma this thick!?

208429.「ヴァレリアに 何かあってみろ……！\n そしたら まず 俺が\n 矢面に 立た:
If something happens to Valeria...! Then I'll
be the one who suffers for it...

208430.「冗談じゃねえ！！\n 出世すりゃ おいしい思いができると思って\n ここまで:
Are you kidding me? I've been holding out this
long thinking I'd get a promotion and have
good times ahead!

208432.「私はいい……。早く この子の手当てを……。: I'm fine... Hurry, and get her patched up...

208435.「この付近で 魔瘴が 噴出したのでしょうか。\n こんなになるなんて……\n ヴ:
Did demon miasma erupt in this vicinity? I
can't believe this has happened... Lady
Valeria, please don't be discouraged...

208436.「ああ……まだ 生きている子が いたんですね。\n よかった。:
Ah...so there was still a child alive. That's
good.

208437.「ヤイル 待て。\n その回復薬……まずは 私が飲む。:
Jair, wait. That medicine... I'll take it
first.

208438.「い…いえ。ヴァレリア様より\n その子のほうが 重傷ですから……:
N, no. The girl is more seriously injured
than you, Lady Valeria.

208439.「アイツが ヴァレリア様を\n 後回しにするなんて 珍しいな……。:
That's weird... he would never put anyone
before Lady Valeria...

208442.「ヤイル…… これは どういうことだ？: Jair... what is the meaning of this?

208443.「こ…これは 薬の中身が いつの間にか\n すりかえられていたとしか……。:
Th... the contents of the vial must have been
switched...

208444.「そ…そうだ！ あいつらです！\n この時期に 我が国を訪れた よそ者が\n 犯:
Th...that's right! It was them! Isn't it natural that the stranger who visited our country at just this time would be the
culprit!?

208445.「こやつらとは 少し前に ここで会った。\n それゆえ 私と この孤児院の関係を:
I met them here not too long ago. Therefore,
it's not surprising that they knew of my
connection to this orphanage.

208446.「そこにいる ベルトロには\n 以前 院長が 腰を痛めた時\n この孤児院の世話:
I once asked Bertro to take care of this
orphanage when the director had a back
injury...

208447.「それ以外 私は 孤児院のことを話していない。\n そこでだ ヤイル……貴様は:
Other than them, I told no one about the
orphanage. So, Jair... what made you think
this orphanage had any value to me?

208448.「ヴァレリア様！\n 私の忠誠を 疑うのですか！？: Lady Valeria! Are you questioning my loyalty!?

208449.「貴様の忠誠心を 疑ったことはない。\n だが それで 貴様が\n 過ちを 犯さ:
I have never doubted your loyalty. But that
doesn't mean you won't make mistakes.

208450.「……魔瘴石を使い 事故に見せかけ\n 皆を殺したのだな ヤイル。:
...You used the Miasmite to make it look like
an accident and killed everyone, Jair.

208452.「魔王ヴァレリアッ！\n コイツは 俺たちが 相手をする！\n だから あんたは:
Demon King Valeria! We'll deal with him! So
you focus on helping that kid!

208453.「クソッ！ 私の 邪魔をするなッ！！: Damn it! Get out of my way!

208454.「バルディスタに 害なすゴミどもめ！\n 私が 皆殺しにしてやるッ！！:
You filth! You're all a blight on Valdista!
I will kill you all!

208455.「我が バルディスタに……\n ヴァレリア様に 栄光あれェええええええッ！！: Glory to Valdista... glory to Lady Valeria!

208456.「また 貴様らか……何しに来た？: You again... why are you here?

208457.「魔王ヴァレリア様。いかがです？\n 先日の件 その後 お心変わりは\n ござい:
Demon King Valeria. How are you? After what
happened the other day, have you had any
change of heart?

208458.「……貴様も くどいな。\n 何度 来たとて 私の心は変わらんぞ。:
You're so annoying. No matter how many times
you come here, my heart will not be swayed.

208459.「私も 女性に しつこくするのは\n 本意ではないのですがね。我が主は\n それ:
It is not my intention to pester women either.
My lord just has such high expectations for
you.

208460.「冗談は それが通じる相手に言え。\n これ以上 食い下がるというのなら\n 我:
Jokes are only for those who enjoy them. If
you persist in this, I will consider it an
act of war against Valdista.

208461.「それは 困ります。ところで……: That would be troubling. By the way...

208462.「前回は こちらも ぶしつけでした。\n 本日は このような手土産を 持参したの:
Last time, we were also very blunt. Today, I
have brought you this gift, which I hope you
will accept.

208464.「フッ。貴様らが あの子たちに\n ここまで 気に入られてるとはな。:
Hmph. I didn't realize you guys were so well
liked by those kids.

208465.「お気に召していただけたようで\n 何よりです。: We are glad you liked it.

208466.「……だが バルディスタを なめるな。\n 私は こんな物で 懐柔されたりはせん:
...But don't underestimate Valdista. I will
not be swayed by such a thing.

208467.「謁見中のところ 申し訳ございません！\n 失礼いたします！:
I apologize for interrupting your audience!
Please forgive me!

208468.「何事かッ！\n 謁見中に 無礼であるぞ！:
What's going on? It's rude to disrupt an
audience!

208469.「はっ。ですが 火急の件でして\n 急ぎ ご報告をばと……。:
Yes. This is an urgent matter, so I had to
report it immediately...

208471.「はっ。じつは バルディア山岳地帯にある\n 月明かりの谷の方面で 魔瘴が\n:
Yes! It seems that a large amount of demon
miasma has emerged in the direction of the
Moonlit Valley in the Valdia Mountain Region!

208473.「わかった。お前は 急いで\n 魔瘴対策部隊を 向かわせろ。:
I understand. You, send the demon miasma
countermeasure team as soon as possible.

208474.「私は 先に行く。馬を引け！: I'll go on ahead. Ready my steed!

208476.「おい 聞いたな。\n 月明かりの谷といえば 孤児院のある方角だ。\n 俺たちも:
Hey, you heard. Moonlit Valley is where the
orphanage is. Let's get there as soon as we
can.

208478.「あっ！ あの お兄ちゃんたち\n もどってきたぞ！\n ローゼ はやくしろよー:
Ah! The bro and his friend are back! Rosey,
hurry up!

208481.「うんうん！ ちゃんと お花\n とってきたみたいね！\n それ ちょっと かり:
Yeah, yeah! I see you got the flowers.
I'm going to borrow those for a bit.

208482.リズティは <pc>から\nバルディジニアの花を ぶんどった！:
Lizty just grabbed Valdia Zinnia Flowers from
<pc>!

208485.「……まおうさま。お兄ちゃんたちと\n なかよくしてあげてください。\n みえっ:
...Demon King. Please be friends with these
guys. They may not look like it, but they're
very nice guys.

208486.「……まおうさまへ。この お兄ちゃんは\n たいぷじゃないかも しれないけど\n:
...Dear Demon King, this guy may not be your
type, but he's a good guy, so be nice to
him...

208487.「……なるほど。お前たち みんなで\n これを書いてくれたのか。\n 内容は 引:
...I see. You all wrote this together. The
content is a bit messy, but thanks!

208488.「いいの。気にしないで。\n こんど くる時に 高級なおかしなんか\n もってこ:
It's okay. Don't worry about it. There's no
need to bring expensive sweets when you come
back next time.

208490.「よし……。あとは お花と手紙に\n こうして リボンを\n クルクルっと 巻い:
Okay... Now all we need to do is wrap the
ribbon around the flowers and the letter like
this...

208491.「はい！ できあがり。\n まおう様と 仲良くなるための\n 仲良しセットよ。:
Yes! It's done. A "get-along set" to help you
make friends with the Demon King.

208493.「ああ よく できてるな。\n これなら あの おっかない魔王も\n 気に入って:
Ah, it's very well done. I'm sure even that
rabid Demon King will like this!

208494.「さて……と。この花と手紙で\n 氷の魔女様の気持ちも\n 溶けてくれると いい:
Well... I hope these flowers and letter
will melt the Ice Witch's heart...

208495.「まあ やれるだけ やってみよう。\n さっそく こいつを持って\n バルディス:
Well, all we can do now is try. Let's take
this to Valdista Castle.

208496.「まあ……。アナタがた。\n こんな所へ 何をしにいらしたの？: Oh, my... you. What brings you to this place?

208497.「ちょっと 聞きたいことがあってな……。\n あんた ここの責任者か？\n ここ:
I'd like to ask you a few questions... Are you
in charge here? What exactly is this place?

208498.「あら そうでしたの……。\n ここは 月明かりの家。\n 私と 子供達だけが暮:
Oh, is that all... This is the Moonlit House.
It's a small orphanage where only the children
and I live.

208500.「まおうさまー！ みてみて！\n ぼく あたらしい ひっさつわざを\n あみだし:
Demon King! Look at this! I've created a new
and unique skill! It's so powerful!

208501.「なによ。おねしょシウバのくせに～。\n まおう様ー。シウバったら\n きのうも:
So what? You're still bed-wetting Silva! Demon
King! Silva wet the bed yesterday, too!

208502.「そ…そういうこと 言うなよ！\n リズティ姉ちゃんの アホアホだいまじん！！: D, don't say that! Stupid sister Lizty!

208503.「あれは 魔王ヴァレリアじゃないか。\n どうして ここに……？:
Isn't that Demon King Valeria? Why is she
here...?

208504.「あら……。\n どうしても 何も この月明かりの家は\n ヴァレリア様が お作:
My... but of course, the Moonlit House was
built by Lady Valeria.

208505.「あの ヴァレリアが 孤児院だって！？\n まさか 子供達を まるまると育てて\:
Valeria is running an orphanage? You don't
think she's just raising a bunch of kids so
she can eat them, do you?

208506.「まあ……。アナタ そんなことを\n ヴァレリア様に 聞かれたら\n まっぷたつ:
Oh dear... if Lady Valeria hears you talking
like that, she'll cut you clean in two.

208507.「アナタたち お若そうだけど\n １０００年程前に 魔界とアストルティアの間で\:
You look young, but did you know that there
was a great war between the Demon World and
Astoltia about 1,000 years ago?<yesno><close>

208508.「あら そう……。\n 若い人達は もう 知らないのね。: Oh, I see... youngsters don't know anymore.

208509.「１０００年ほど前。ネロドスという大魔王のもと\n 配下の大軍が アストルティア:
About 1000 years ago, the Demon Lord
Nerodos and his army invaded Astoltia, and a
great war broke out.

208510.「その後 ネロドスの死と共に\n アストルティアでの戦いは 終わったわ。\n で:
Then, with the death of Nerodos, the battle in
Astoltia was over. But...

208511.「アストルティアとの 戦が終わった後も\n 支配者なき魔界では 混乱が続き 敵味:
Even after the war with Astoltia ended, chaos continued in the Demon World without a ruler, leading to a civil war in which the people
killed each other with reckless abandon.

208512.「当時 まだ幼かった ヴァレリア様は\n 目の前でご家族を殺されたうえ ご自身も:
Valeria, who was very young at the time, had
her family killed in front of her eyes, and
she herself risked her life as a warrior.

208513.「ほう……。あの魔王\n 思った以上に 長生きしてるんだな。:
Oh... that Demon King has lived longer than
I thought.

208514.「その後 マデサゴーラという 覇者が誕生し\n 内乱は収まったけど その大魔王も:
After that, the civil war ended with the birth of Madesagora, the next Demon Lord, but now that he's dead, too...the age of war will
begin again.

208515.「……ヴァレリア様が ご自身にも 周りの者にも\n たいへん お厳しいのは あの:
Valeria is very strict with herself and with those around her, so that her people will never again have to suffer the horrors of that
time.

208516.「私は あの方ほど 我欲を捨てて\n 民のために 身を粉にしている魔王を\n 他:
I have never known another Demon King who is
so selfless and devoted to their people.

208518.「どうすれば あなたが 大魔王になることに\n 興味をお持ちになるかと 悩んだ末:
We ended up here after wondering how we could
interest you in becoming the Demon Lord.

208519.「よろしければ いかがです？\n こちらで ファラザード産の紅茶を飲みながら\n:
How about it, if you don't mind? We could sit
here and chat about it over a cup of
Farazardan tea.

208520.「……運が 良かったな。この場所でなければ\n 貴様を たたき斬っていたところだ:
...You're lucky. If we were anywhere else, I
would have cut you down where you stand.

208521.「私の弱味を握ろうとしても 時間の無駄だぞ。\n 策を弄するなら もっと別のこと:
You're wasting your time trying to uncover my weakness. If you're going to resort to tricks, then you should use your brain for something
more useful.

208522.「ねえ みてみて～！ あの お兄ちゃん\n まおう様に フラれちゃったみたいね！:
Hey, look, look! Looks like the Demon King
just dumped that guy!

208523.「カッコいいのに かわいそうね！: He's so cool, but now I feel sorry for him!

208524.「そうね。でも ああいう プライドがたかくて\n めんどくさそうな 男のヒトって:
Yeah, true. But a man with such a prideful and
troublesome personality may not be the Demon
King's type!

208525.「まさか 俺のことじゃないよな……？: Could it be...they're talking about me...?

208526.「あっ お兄ちゃん。げんき だして！\n あなた けっこう カッコいいし……\n:
Aw, cheer up, mister! You're pretty cool,
and...um...things can only get better for you!

208527.「……はげましてくれて ありがとうよ。\n 君達も もっと 大人になれば\n 俺:
Thank you for the encouragement. I'm sure
you'll understand my charms when you're older.

208528.「ところで お嬢さん。\n 俺は あの魔王様と 仲良くなりたいんだが\n まった:
By the way, little lady. I'm trying to get
along with the Demon King, but she hasn't
opened her heart to me at all.

208529.「どうしたら 魔王様は \n 俺に 心を開いてくれるだろうか？\n 知恵を 貸し:
How can I get the Demon King to open up to me?
Will you share your wisdom with me?

208530.「まっ！ あなた 意外とコンジョーあるのね！\n いいわ！ 教えてあげる！\n:
Oh! You're even bolder than I thought! Okay!
I'll teach you! You see, girls...

208531.「女の子は みんな おかしが大好きなの！\n やきたてのフルーツパイを つくれば:
Every girl loves sweets! Making a freshly
baked fruit pie will make the Demon King
smile!

208532.「ローゼったら なにいってるの！\n まおう様は おかしよりも\n キレイな宝石:
Rosey, what are you talking about? Obviously

the Demon King loves beautiful jewels more
than sweets!

208533.「お前ら ふたりとも 自分が ほしいものを\n いってるだけじゃねーかっ！\n:
Both of you are just saying what you'd want!
The Demon King doesn't want those kinds of
things!

208534.「まおうさまなら きっと\n でんせつのぶきを ほしがるはずだぜ！\n はかいの:
I'm sure the Demon King would want a legendary
weapon! Like a Sword of Destruction, or a
Sword of Slaughtering!

208535.「やれやれ……。\n こりゃ 面倒だが 魔王様の好みを\n ひとりひとりに 聞い:
Good grief... this is a troublesome situation,
but I guess we'll just have to ask all of them
about the the Demon King's preferences.

208536.「よし。何を 贈れば\n ヴァレリアが よろこぶのか\n 子供たちに 話を聞いて:
Okay. Let's talk to the kids about what we can
give Valeria to make her happy.

208537.「お前達は ブラニック採石場に 巣くう\n 盗賊どもを倒してくれた 功労者だった:
You and your colleagues were instrumental in
defeating the thieves who were holed up in the
Branick Quarry. You have done well.

208538.「私に 用があるそうだな。\n よかろう。なんなりと 申してみよ。:
I heard you have something for me. Very well.
Let's have it, then.

208539.「はっ。謁見をお許しいただき 感謝します。: Yes. Thank you for granting me this audience.

208540.「私は 砂の都ファラザードの魔王に仕える\n 使者ユシュカと申します。:
I am Yushka, a messenger in the service
of the Demon King of the Sand City Farazard.

208541.「我が主……ファラザードの魔王から\n ヴァレリア様に こちらの書簡を\n お届:
My lord, the Demon King of Farazard, has asked
me to deliver this letter to Lady Valeria.

208542.「ふむ。砂の都ファラザードか。\n バルディスタとは 相容れぬ国だが\n そこの:
Hmm. Sand City Farazard. A nation that is no
match for Valdista, but what does that Demon
King...?

208544.「……いかがでございましょう？\n 我が主は ヴァレリア様に\n ぜひ 大審門ま:
What do you think? My lord would very much
like for Lady Valeria to come to the
Demongate.

208546.「現在 我が国が 最も優先すべきことは\n アストルティアへの再侵攻だ。\n 魔:
Our nation's highest priority at the moment
is to re-invade Astoltia. We don't have time
for Demon Kings to cozy up to each other.

208547.「……大魔王になれば 今よりさらに\n 強大なチカラを得ることも 可能でしょう。:
If you became the Demon Lord, you would
be even more powerful than you are now. It
wouldn't be a bad thing for you.

208548.「よほど その騒ぎに 私を巻き込みたいようだが\n 高所から見下す 魔仙卿とやら:
You seem to want to drag me into your affairs, but I don't like the idea of this Oracle looking down on me from on high, and I'm not
interested in the power he can give me.

208549.「……用件は それだけか？\n ならば 謁見は これまでだ。\n 下がるがよい。:
...Was that all? Then this audience is ended.
You may leave now.

208550.「本当に それで よろしいのですか？\n あなたの 知らないところで\n 新しい:
Are you really okay with this? Even if a new
Demon Lord were to be born without your
knowledge...

208552.「謁見は これまでと言ったはずだ。: I said this audience is at an end.

208553.「どこの馬の骨が 大魔王になろうとも\n 我がバルディスタの前に 立ちはだかるの:
Whomever the Demon Lord may be, if they
stand in the way of Valdista, they will become
a stain upon my halberd.

208554.「ヴァレリア様 どちらへ……？: Lady Valeria, where are you going...?

208555.「……すぐに戻る。私が留守の間\n 城のことは ベルトロと貴様に まかせるぞ。:
...I will return soon. While I'm gone, you and
Bertro are in charge of the castle.

208557.「アーア。フラれちまったねェ。: Ahh. Looks like you were rejected.

208558.「そう ニラむなよ。\n 男前が 台無しだぜ。:
You shouldn't scowl like that. It ruins your
boyish charms.

208559.「バルディア山岳地帯にある 月明かりの谷……。\n そこに行けば 何か つかめる:
The Moonlit Valley in Valdia Mountain
Region... you might find something there.

208560.「貴様 なんで そんなことを 俺たちに……？: Why are you telling us this...?

208561.「今のは ただの独り言さ。\n アンタらは 城で 誰かの独り言を聞いた。\n そ:
Just a slip of the tongue. You simply
overheard someone in the castle talking to
themselves, that's all... get my drift?

208562.「……おふたりとも ご助力 感謝します。\n あなたたちのおかげで 魔瘴石の確保:
Thank you both for your help. Thanks to you,
we'll be able to secure the Miasmite in time.

208563.「約束どおり バルディスタ城に入れるよう\n 手配しておきましょう。ヴァレリア様:
I will arrange for you to enter Valdista
Castle as promised. I will inform Lady Valeria
of your request for an audience.

208564.「よろしく頼む。あんたも\n 苦労が多そうだが 負けるなよ。:
Please take care. I know you have a lot of
hard work ahead of you, but don't give up.

208565.「いえ……。私は昔 敵兵に殺されかけたところを\n ヴァレリア様に 救っていただ:
No... I was almost killed by enemy soldiers in
the past, but Lady Valeria saved me... and now
I am happy to be able to return the favor.

208567.「……それでは 私は 工房長に\n 盗賊を倒したことを 伝えに行きます。\n 城:
Well then, I'm going to go tell the workshop
chief that we have defeated the thieves. I
will see you at the castle.

208568.「ひっ ひいい～～～！！\n すみませんでした！ すみませんでしたァ！: Hi-hiiii～! I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry!

208569.「こ…これからは 俺達 全身全霊で 死ぬまで\n バルディスタのために はたらき:
From now on... we will work for Valdista with
all our might until we die! So please spare
us～!

208570.「……あの方を 侮辱したことは 万死に値する。: ...You deserve to die for your insults.

208571.「ひええ……！ 偉大なる ヴァレリア様に\n 不敬をはたらいたことを 心から悔い:
Hieee...! I sincerely repent for my disrespect
to the great Valeria! Therefore, please
forgive me～!

208572.「ま…魔王ヴァレリア様 バンザイッ！\n バルディスタに 栄光あれ～ッ！！: H-hail Demon King Valeria! Glory to Valdista!

208573.「まったく 調子のいい奴らめ……。\n だが こやつらほどの チカラがあれば\n:
Geez, not missing a beat... but if they have
any power, they might be useful as simple
rank-and-file soldiers.

208574.「仕方ない。今後は 心を入れ替えて\n バルディスタのために 尽くすというのなら:
It can't be helped. If you've truly repented
and devote yourself to Valdista from now on,
then I'll give my word to the Demon King...

208575.「その必要はない。: There is no need for that.

208577.「盗賊どもが この採石場を\n 占拠していると聞いて やってきたが\n どうやら:
I came here because I heard some thieves were
occupying this quarry, and it looks like these
are the ones I'm searching for.

208578.「はっ！ ですが その件は すでに解決しており\n この者たちは これからは心を:
Yes! But the matter has already been resolved,
and these men will now change their minds and
become low-ranking soldiers...

208580.「キサマらのおかげで 思っていたより\n 楽に片付いた。礼を言うぞ。:
Thanks to you, this went a lot easier than I
thought it would. You have my thanks.

208581.「私は 先に 城へ戻る。ヤイル。\n 魔瘴弾は ３日以内に手配しろ。\n それ以:
I'm going back to the castle first. Jair. I
want the Miasmite shells ready in three days.
I will not wait any longer than that.

208584.「盗賊が 占拠しているっていうのは\n この奥なのか……？:
Is this where the thieves have been hiding
out?

208585.「気をつけろ！ 狙われているぞッ！: Watch out! They're gunning for us!

208586.「ヒヒ！ あの クソッタレな傭兵どもの次は\n ずいぶん カワイコちゃん達が\n:
Heehee! Compared to those crappy mercenaries,
we got ourselves some pretty-looking kids!

208587.「おいおい！ ジャン。\n アイツぁ 女魔王の側近だぜ。\n 小汚くないほうの…:
Hey, Jan! That's the right hand man of the
Demon King. The not-so-scruffy looking one...

208588.「お前たちが この採石場を占拠している\n 盗賊どもだな！ 本来 バルディスタへ:
So you're the thieves who are occupying this
quarry! Treason against Valdista is punishable
by death.

208589.「罪を認め 投降すれば\n 今回だけは 罪を減じてやるッ。\n さあ 大人しく:
If you admit your guilt and surrender, we may
be more lenient with your punishment. Now,
give yourselves up!

208590.「ケッ！ あの女魔王が 飼ってる犬にしちゃ\n ずいぶん 甘ッタレだな。極刑だっ:
Keh! You're pretty naive for a dog of that
lady Demon King. If it's death you want, then
we'll just kill you all here right now!

208591.「しかし あの女魔王も おカタいフリして\n こんな カワイコちゃん はべらして:
That Demon King lady must be nice despite
acting tough, if she keeps a cute little kid
like you around!

208592.「グフフ！ ああ見えて けっこう俗物なんだな！\n どうやって あの女魔王に 取:
Guffaw! You must be quite the brownnoser! Why
don't you teach us how you wrapped that lady
Demon King around your finger, little puppy?

208593.「私を 愚弄するのは 別に構わない……。\n だが 我が主ヴァレリア様を 愚弄す:
You can taunt me all you want, but if you
insult Lady Valeria, I will not let you live!

208594.「生かして帰さないのは こっちのセリフだッ！\n いけッ キラーホイール！\n:
You're the one who's not leaving here alive!
Come on, Killer Wheels! Kill them all!

208595.「くっ……！ この盗賊どもは\n 私が なんとかします！ あなた達は\n そのマ:
Kgh...! I'll take care of these thieves! You
guys deal with that machine!

208596.「そんな……話が 違うじゃないですか！: That's... that's not what we agreed upon!

208597.「いや ウチも もちろん 売りたいんですよ。\n だけど 材料の魔瘴石が採れる:
No, of course we want to sell. But the
quarry where we get our Miasmite is occupied
by a gang of thieves...

208598.「先ほど その話は 聞きました。\n どうして もっと早く\n 報告してくれなか:
I heard about that before. Why didn't you
report it sooner!?

208599.「石の納品が遅れてたんで ウチも 傭兵たちを\n 向かわせたんですよ。でも そい:
The delivery of the stones was delayed, so we
sent mercenaries to the site. But they never
came back, so we were late confirming it.

208600.「傭兵たちは 返り討ちにあったということか……\n アストルティアへの再侵攻を:
So the mercenaries were defeated, at a time
when we must hurry to invade Astoltia
again...!

208601.「くッ……！ このままでは\n ヴァレリア様を 失望させてしまうではないか！:
Kgh...! If we don't do something, Lady
Valeria will be disappointed!

208602.「こうなったら 私が 直接\n ブラニック採石場に……。:
In that case, I'll go to Branick Quarry myself
if I have to...

208603.「いやいや あの盗賊団 めっぽう強いんですぜ。\n ウデの立つ 傭兵どもが\n:
No, no, those thieves are very strong. All
those skilled mercenaries ended up dead!

208604.「何か 困っているようだな。\n よかったら 手を貸そうか。:
You seem to be in some kind of trouble. If you
like, we can lend a hand.

208606.「そんな所に ひとりで行くのは 危険だろう。\n 魔王の側近である あんたに\n:
It would be dangerous to go to such a place alone. It would be a big deal if something were to happen to you, a close associate of
the Demon King.

208607.「自慢じゃないが 俺たちは ウデが立つ。\n きっと あんたの チカラになれると:
I don't mean to brag, but we're good at what
we do. I'm sure we can be of help to you.

208608.「……私が ヴァレリア様の側近と\n 知った上で 声をかけてきたということは\n:
...You must be plotting something if you
approached me knowing I was close to Lady
Valeria.

208609.「あなたがたの チカラを借りたとして\n いったい 私に どんな見返りを\n 求:
And what are you expecting from me in return
for your help?

208610.「はは。話が早くて 助かるな。: Ha ha. Thanks for cutting to the chase.

208611.「そう警戒しなくていい。\n 俺は 砂の都ファラザードの使者で\n バルディスタ:
No need to be alarmed. I am an emissary from
the Sand City Farazard, seeking an audience
with the Demon King of Valdista.

208612.「だが 先の魔王への襲撃事件で\n 城は厳戒態勢。俺たちのような 一見客は\n:
However, the castle is on high alert due to
the recent attack on the Demon King. Visitors
like us will be turned away without question.

208613.「そこで 魔王の側近である あんたから\n 城へ入る許可を もらえるなら\n こ:
So, if I can get permission to enter the castle from you, the Demon King's close associate, there's nothing more reassuring
than that.

208614.「……やはり ウラがありましたか。\n しかし 確かに あなたがたは\n そこい:
I knew it...you were planning something. But
you certainly seem to be more capable than
your typical mercenary.

208615.「……いいでしょう。\n ブラニック採石場にいる 盗賊を倒すため\n チカラを:
...Very well. Please help me defeat the
thieves in Branick Quarry.

208616.「その代わり 盗賊を倒した後は\n あなたがたが バルディスタ城に入れるよう\n:
In return, I will arrange for you to enter
Valdista Castle once the thieves are defeated.

208617.「これで 取り引き成立だな。\n さっそく 盗賊とやらを倒しに\n ブラニック採:
You've got a deal. Now let's head to Branick
Quarry and take down those thieves.

208618.「もし 仮に 盗賊を倒せたとしても\n 我が国の魔王 ヴァレリア様の御前では\n:
Even if you do defeat the thieves, please do
not be disrespectful in the presence of our
Demon King Valeria!

208619.「それは むろん 先刻ご承知だ。\n 氷の魔女様を 怒らせるのは\n ファラザー:
Of course, I'm well aware of that. It would be
against the king of Farazard's wishes to
offend the Ice Witch.

208620.「おお……。\n ファラザードの王にさえ 怖れられているとは\n さすが 我が主:
Oh... to be feared even by the king of
Farazard, as expected of Lady Valeria!

208621.「砂の都の使者達よ！\n ともに 盗賊どもを倒しましょう！\n バルディスタと:
Messengers of the City of Sand! Together we
will defeat the thieves! For Valdista and
Demon King Valeria!

208622.「……それでは 私は先に 南東にある\n ブラニック採石場に 向かうので\n そ:
Well then, I'll head southeast to Branick
Quarry first and meet up with you there.

208623.「なんだ 貴様らはッ！\n この先の王城へは 立ち入り禁止だ。:
Who the hell are you!? The royal castle
beyond this point is off limits.

208624.「私は ファラザード国の魔王の使者だ。\n 魔王ヴァレリア陛下への 謁見を望んで:
I am an emissary of the Demon King of
Farazard. I seek an audience with Her Majesty
Demon King Valeria. Will you let me pass?

208627.「先ほど 通達が あっただろう。\n 魔王様への 襲撃が あったばかりだから\n:
We were informed just a few minutes ago. Since
the Demon King was recently attacked, no one
is to pass through without permission.

208628.「一国の王の 使者であってもか？\n それは いささか 無礼であろう。:
Not even an emissary of the king of a country?
That's a bit rude.

208629.「……この国では どのような身分の者であっても\n いっさい 例外は 認めない。:
...No exceptions are allowed in this country,
no matter what your status. Give up and go
home!

208630.「ったく……。融通のきかない国だ。\n これは 先が 思いやられる。:
Geez... what an inflexible country. I worry
for their future.

208631.「門番の兵士は 入城の許可のない者は\n 通せないと 言っていたよな……。\n:
So the gate guards said they won't let anyone
in the castle without permission... Then we'll
just have to get that, won't we?

208632.「よし。バルディスタの城下町で 入城の許可を\n 取るための情報を 探ってみるぞ:
Alright. Let's go to Valdista's castle town
and see if we can't get ourselves permission
to enter the castle.

208633.「ここは バルディスタ要塞。\n お前に 瀕死のキズを負わせたという\n あの魔:
This is Fortress Valdista. This is the nation
ruled by Demon King Valeria, the one who very
nearly killed you.

208634.「すでに ヴァレリアの強さは\n その身体で 味わったと思うが あいつは\n 戦:
You've already had a taste of Valeria's
strength, her command of the battlefield, and
her judgment...

208635.「どんな不利な戦も 勝ち戦にしてしまう\n その圧倒的な強さから 敵軍の兵士達か:
She's feared by her enemies as the Ice Witch who brings death because of her overwhelming strength that can turn even the most
disadvantageous battle into a victory.

208636.「ひと筋縄では いかないだろうが\n なんとかして 会談を 取りつけるぞ。\n:
It's not going to be easy, but I'll do my best
to arrange a meeting. Now, let's get to the
castle...

208637.「おーい お前らーッ！\n ヴァレリア様の ご帰還だぞォーッ！！: Hey, you guys! Lady Valeria has returned!

208638.「どうやら ウワサどおり\n 教育が 行き届いているようだな……。:
Looks like the rumors about their discipline
were true...

208639.「よし。こいつは 絶好のチャンスだ。\n ちょっと 話しかけてみようぜ。:
All right. This is a perfect chance. Let's go
talk to her.

208642.「ジャムール王国を 覚えているかッ！: Do you remember the Kingdom of Jamoule?

208644.「私は キサマの率いる軍に 一夜で滅ぼされた\n ジャムール王国の王子 ダル・ジ:
I am Dar Jamoule, prince of the Kingdom of
Jamoule, which was destroyed in a single night
by an army led by you!

208645.「祖国の名誉にかけて キサマを殺すッ！！: For the honor of my kingdom, I will kill you!

208646.「……うつけめ。\n 彼我の力量差すら 推し量れぬから\n 貴様の国は 滅んだの:
...Fool. Your kingdom was destroyed because
you could not even recognize the difference
between your power and ours.

208647.「とても 気軽に話しかけられる雰囲気じゃ\n なくなっちまったな……。:
The friendly atmosphere seems to have been
soured...

208648.「あいつらは どうやら 城へ向かったようだ。\n 俺たちも 向かうぞ。:
Looks like they're headed for the castle.
Let's head there, too.

212101.「え～！ もう きちゃったの～！？\n ちょっと まって～！:
What? ! They're here already～!? Wait a
minute!

212103.「キレイに できてるでしょ～！\n リズティは おおきくなったら\n おはなやさ:
Isn't it pretty? Lizty wants to own a flower
shop when she grows up.

212108.「……コイツらに 抵抗の意思なんて\n もう 無かっただろう。\n 殺すことは:
...I don't think they had the will to resist
anymore. Was it really necessary to kill them?

212109.「この盗賊どもは 以前 城へ向かう\n 荷馬車を襲い 私の部下を殺した……。:
These thieves once attacked a wagon on its way
to the castle and killed one of my men...

212111.「とにかく 頼みごとは片付けたんだから\n 約束は 果たしてもらおう。\n バル:
Anyway, we've done what we were asked to do,
and fulfilled our end of the deal. Let's go
back to Valdista.

244127.「早く 手当てをしましょう。\n まずは この回復薬を 飲ませて……。:
Let's get her patched up quickly. First, let's
give her some of this restorative medicine...

247425.<pc>と ユシュカは\n玉座の間を 後にした…………。:
<pc> and Yushka left the throne
room...
